title: Mining employment opportunities
creator_credit: Film Australia, Don Harley and Keith Gow
brief_description: A record of a visit by seven Aboriginal community leaders from the Northern Territory, to three mining centres, Mount Isa, Mary Kathleen and Bougainville Copper. This enabled them to see how a mining operation works and what kinds of jobs exist in the mines.
